name: Five Riddles
description:
This mini game was made with all five Unreal free of the month assets from July 2019.

You can check those here:

https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US/blog/featured-free-marketplace-content---july-2019?sessionInvalidated=true

Also used Paragon Character Gideon.

Music made by:

Roman Cano
https://www.melodyloops.com/composers/roman-cano/

Made by Marcelo Simeoni Paul
in collaboration with Davi Galisteo and Leonardo Sugahra
